word:
Special work needs to be done in Melrose and Boston. Brother and Sister Starr connected with you can do an important work in that great city. You will need to guard carefully the point of undue expense, lest the work be retarded. The Lord will open ways before you if you will move forward in faith and hope. Let not one word of discouragement come from your lips. --Letter 66, 1910. 

Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D. C. August 1, 1985. Entire Letter.
